data.text: To koro ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho,
Ka ikadho ei pige matut,
Nimar an Jehova Nyasaye, ma Nyasachi,
Nikech in ngʼat makare kendo mogen e nyima
Kik ibed maluor, nimar an kodi;
Abiro wachone joma odak nyandwat ni, ‘Wegi gidhi!’
ngʼato angʼata miluongo gi nyinga,
Keluru jogo man-gi wenge to ok nyal neno,
Ogendini duto chokore kanyakla
Jehova Nyasaye wacho niya, “Un joneno maga ma wuoyo kuoma”
An e Jehova Nyasaye adier,
An awuon ema asenyisou, aseresou kendo asewachonu
Ee An ema asebetie nyaka aa chakruok.
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye,
An e Jehova Nyasaye, Jal Maler,
Ma e gima Jehova Nyasaye wacho,
bende namiyo geche lweny kod farese odonjo kuno,
Koro awachonu niya, “Goluru chunyu oko e gik machon
Neuru, atimo gimoro manyien!
Le mag thim ma gin
gin ji mane achweyo ne an awuon,
“To kata kamano ne ok uluonga mondo akonyu, yaye Jakobo,
Ok usechiwo rombe mondo otimnago misango miwangʼo pep,
Ne ok ungʼiewona gimoro amora mangʼwe ngʼar,
“An kende e jal magolo richou duto
Parnauru gik mane otimore chon,
Kwaru mokwongo notimo richo;
Kuom mano abiro kuodo wi joma tiyo ei hekalu mau,
